#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define maxn 1005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
	char c;
	c=getchar();
	while(c!='\n' && c!=EOF)
	{
		if(c=='a' || c=='e' || c=='i' || c=='o' || c=='u')
		{
			putchar(c);
			getchar();
			getchar();
		}
		else
		{
			putchar(c);
		}
		c=getchar();
	}
	putchar('\n');
	return 0;	
}
